content:
Now when pressing "start game" the user has the option of moving to a location or selecting an object. There must be at least 3 of those options, and when you press each option, you will be faced with another option.

Make a total of 9 pages according to the rules below.

- When you click start game, the first selection screen appears.
- Before selection, a description of the scene the user will be watching appears.
- When a particular choice is made, the answer is twofold. If you make a wrong choice, you die without being able to escape the uninhabited island, or you acquire the materials for the raft.
- There are a total of 8 raft materials mentioned above, and each page provides one option to obtain raft materials.
- The last 9th page should include the contents of escaping from the uninhabited island by selecting all 8 ingredients.

can you do it
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
